short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight ad and tracker blocker that blocks ads and tracking, speeding up your browsing, and preserving your privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nightshade Barriers is a lightweight ad and tracker blocker. It is completely free and open-source software that utilizes domain blacklists from the Pi-Hole community and elsewhere online to ensure your browsing stays fast and private.
